article_title: Israeli claims control of key crossing ahead of ceasefire talks resuming.
sentence: There  was  the  constant  sound  of  Israeli  bombardments  and  the  Israeli  army  says  it  has  killed  20  -  what  it  calls    Hamas  "terrorists"  -  and  says  it  has  found  three  tunnel  shafts  in  that  area  around  the  crossing.
